lines.i: This class is used to convey a risk of suicide. This class contains an association to the full details of a patient's suicidal ideation and past history of suicide attempts.

ol.li: Contains zero or more [0..*] suicidalideation, where its type is Suicidal Ideation Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Suicide Risk
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Suicide Risk
Contains zero or more [0..*] suicidalideation, where its type is Suicidal Ideation Observation
